method.name: getAppDirName
method.description: The name of the application directory, relative to the project directory. Default is "src/main/application".

method.name: getDeploymentDescriptor
method.description: A custom deployment descriptor configuration. Default is an "application.xml" with sensible defaults.

method.name: appDirName
method.description: Allows changing the application directory. Default is "src/main/application".

method.name: getLibDirName
method.description: The name of the library directory in the EAR file. Default is "lib".

method.name: libDirName
method.description: Allows changing the library directory in the EAR file. Default is "lib".

method.name: deploymentDescriptor
method.description:
Configures the deployment descriptor for this EAR archive.

The given closure is executed to configure the deployment descriptor. The DeploymentDescriptor is passed to the closure as its delegate.


param:configureClosure The closure.

returns:This.

property.name: libDirName
property.description: The name of the library directory in the EAR file. Default is "lib".

property.name: deploymentDescriptor
property.description: A custom deployment descriptor configuration. Default is an "application.xml" with sensible defaults.

property.name: appDirName
property.description: The name of the application directory, relative to the project directory. Default is "src/main/application".
